title: Apple airpods 2nd gen Flipkart 8100/- worth buying?
selftext:
[https://www.flipkart.com/apple-airpods-2nd-gen-charging-case-bluetooth-headset-mic/p/itm8f1b2b0173ce4](https://www.flipkart.com/apple-airpods-2nd-gen-charging-case-bluetooth-headset-mic/p/itm8f1b2b0173ce4)

I have been eyeing apple airpods for some time now. They are available for 8100/- after discounts. Recently there has been lot of posts about Flipkart acting scammy. Should I buy these from Flipkart? They are either not available on amazon [https://www.amazon.in/Apple-AirPods-with-Charging-Case/dp/B07Q6153FQ](https://www.amazon.in/Apple-AirPods-with-Charging-Case/dp/B07Q6153FQ) of priced higher.
